Posts.EditableText: While looking at my inbox just now, I saw this message: One private message had been removed due to private message filters. Since I didn't set up any filters, I assume this is defined in the forum itself. What kinds of messages can be removed? Should I worry that a legitimate message might have been sent to the "Quest spam folder"?
Posts.HTML:
While looking at my inbox just now, I saw this message:

One private message had been removed due to private message filters.

Since I didn't set up any filters, I assume this is defined in the forum itself. What kinds of messages can be removed? Should I worry that a legitimate message might have been sent to the "Quest spam folder"?

Posts.EditableText: I think this happens when your PM inbox is full - new message cause old ones to be deleted.
Posts.HTML: I think this happens when your PM inbox is full - new message cause old ones to be deleted.

Posts.EditableText: Ah yes! That was it. Wow, I hope I didn't miss anything important.
Posts.HTML: Ah yes! That was it. Wow, I hope I didn't miss anything important.

Posts.EditableText: I think it deletes old read messages first. At least, that's what I always assumed.
Posts.HTML: I think it deletes old read messages first. At least, that's what I always assumed.

Posts.EditableText: I see. So it's more notifying you that you lost an old one as opposed to a new one. That makes more sense.
Posts.HTML: I see. So it's more notifying you that you lost an old one as opposed to a new one. That makes more sense.

Posts.EditableText: Same thing happen to me at other forum. I guess the are coded alike.
Posts.HTML: Same thing happen to me at other forum. I guess the are coded alike.
